title: Her Majesty’s Prison and Probation Service workforce statistics
description: Information on staffing numbers of directly employed staff of Her Majesty’s Prison and Probation Service and formerly the National Offender Management Service.
datasetNotes: On the landing page page scroll to documents and click on the latest release, this will open a new window, the data can be found under documents titled HMPPS workforce statistics bulletin.
sizingNotes: A large number of messy tables it may be possible to use the sickness tables rather than the whole spreadsheet
notes: Although not specifically Covid-19  the spreadsheets may allow the impact of the pandemic to be derived in the future. The latest version is up to 31 March 2020 and sickness rates are included.
